projects.title: LEGO Brick Sorting Machine
projects.description: A LEGO brick sorting machine using a vibratory plate for seperation, visual color detection and magnetic valves that trigger compressed air bursts to sort bricks quickly and precisely by color.

projects.title: Rocket League Overlay
projects.description: A dynamic streaming overlay for Rocket League Esports matches, designed to read and seamlessly display in-game data. It also includes a caster panel for easy adjustment of match information.

projects.title: Swagger For AAS
projects.description: Reads data from Asset Administration Shells, generalizes it, and generates a comprehensive Swagger UI documentation to ensure clarity and accessibility for developers.

projects.title: Webmaster MVB
projects.description: A website for a local music club, where we design and display news, manage email communication, and handle various online tasks to keep the community informed and engaged.
